name: Ruby & Majesty: Treasure Team
description: Solve action based puzzles by coordinating two distinct characters, each with their own capabilities. Ruby the Human and Majesty the Bat must navigate strange environments in search of treasure and the secrets of their world.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 处理器: 1.8 Ghz 内存: 500 MB RAM 图形: NVIDIA GT/S 4xx, Intel 4000 or equivalent DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 800 MB 可用空间
